Imports

sdl, common, screen

Types

TKeyEventKind = enum 
  down, up
TKeyEvent = tuple[key: TKey, event: TKeyEventKind]
TButtonEvent = tuple[button: int, event: TKeyEventKind]

proc isButtonEvent(btn: int; event: TKeyEventKind): bool
